title: Automatic Microscope Backend System
description: Developed the backend of an automatic microscope system with deep learning detection, tracking, and segmentation to automate human semen assessment at Delta-care.

title: Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV) Software
description: Software development for Vortex RoboSub 2021 competition AUV team. Designed and implemented collaborative ROS nodes for smart underwater detection and motion planning.

title: Real-time Lane Instance Segmentation
description: Real-time lane detection system using SegNet architecture combined with image processing techniques for autonomous driving applications.
paper: /publications/papers/Real-Time Lane Instance Segmentation Using SegNet and Image Processing.pdf

title: Satellite Imagery Analysis for Urban Development
description: Machine learning project for UN ESCWA analyzing satellite imagery for urban development projects using geospatial data analysis techniques.

title: Federated Learning Framework for UAV-IoT Systems
description: Joint self-organizing maps and knowledge-distillation-based communication-efficient federated learning for resource-constrained UAV-IoT systems.

title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning with Differential Privacy
description: Communication-efficient and privacy-preserving federated learning via joint knowledge distillation and differential privacy in bandwidth-constrained networks.

title: Explainable AI for Medical Image Segmentation
description: Explainable AI system for medical image segmentation with preserved local resolution, focusing on mammogram tumor segmentation.

title: Human Activity Recognition with Federated Learning
description: Federated learning via augmented knowledge distillation for heterogeneous deep human activity recognition systems.

title: Deep Learning-based Context-aware Video Content Analysis
description: Deep learning-based context-aware video content analysis on IoT devices for smart environments.

title: WiFi Sensing for Smart Environments
description: Enhanced environmental awareness and security for smart devices using WiFi-sensing technologies.
